description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nComing Undone:
After your creatures with {CONDNAME_BUFF_LEECH} {ACTION_attack}, they gain 10% {STAT_attack}, {STAT_intelligence}, {STAT_defense}, and {STAT_speed}. This trait does not stack.
name: Devourer Cyst
